name: Ant Miner 3D
description:
Want to come to Ali's World?

Your main goal is to scrape up all the foodstuffs and bring them home!
Only three things matter in this ant game: you, the ants, and the food outside.

Only three things matter in this ant game: you, the ants, and the food that is out there.

Together with your fellow ants, scrape the food, bring it back home, and make the best of your ant friends!
